description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Fight across 28 maps with up to 8 players on XBOX Live. "Ground Breaking" game play will have you howling with laughter when victorious and crying for your momma when you get owned. It's simple: jump, shoot the floor, and last man standing wins! Now with 9 POWERUPS and lobby Mini-game. Music by: bensound.com
